Merchant of Mammon:
May Mammon's blessings be upon you! Mammon's Guild is here to showcase our rare item collection.
Before you start shopping, there are a few things you should know. While we dealt only in Ancient Adena in the past, now we take Adena like any other merchant. Also, you must bring a Blank Scroll if you plan to purchase an Enchant Scroll. If you bring us Soul Crystal Fragments, we can make them into whole Soul Crystals. We also have Elcyum to upgrade items.
Remember, local tax rates apply!
